verbs.description: [V: Caught] [ARG2: on a hot mic] , [ARG1: someone in the media] whispers the obvious while listening to Trump blather on about North Korea .
[R-ARG0: Caught on a hot mic] , [ARG0: someone in the media] [V: whispers] [ARG1: the obvious] [ARGM-TMP: while listening to Trump blather on about North Korea] .
Caught on a hot mic , [ARG0: someone in the media] whispers the obvious while [V: listening] [ARG1: to Trump blather on about North Korea] .
